abstract.para: Comparison of Arctic grayling growth in designated fertilized and unfertilized reaches of Oksrukuyik Creek, June-August 1990.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications
A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Oksrukuyik Creek. Control zone, -0.10 to -1.2K; Fertilized zone, 1.3 to .17K.

description.para:
For Archival Use:
DATE RECEIVED:29Nov90 DATA FILE ENTERED BY: Julie Pallant DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME:Julie Pallant DATE:7Oct91

para.literalLayout: Background data was collected to compare growth of adult grayling from designated control and fertilized river reaches. In early July, two fish weirs which enclosed a 1 km stretch of the river were constructed in each zone. Adult fish within each section were weighed, measured, tagged and released. In August, tagged fish were recaptured to measure growth of individual fish. Wet weights are in grams, and were taken after holding the fish for 24 hours. Length is total length, using the bottom lobe of the caudal fin.
Calculations: Variable Formula LCHANGE RECAPL-LENGTH WTCHANGE RECAPWT-WEIGHT

Variable Variable description Precis./units Coded Missing Y/N Values SITE site of measurement y TAG# number on tag n COLOR Color of tag n TAGDATE date fish was tagged DDMMMYY n y LENGTH TL of fish in July .0/cm n WEIGHT weight of fish in July 0/g n DATE date of measurement DDMMMYY n FORC zone fish was in n D/D capture location .0/km n y COMMENT initial capture comment n RECPDATE date fish recaptured DDMMMYY n RECAPD/D recapture location .0/km n RECAPL TL at recapture .0/cm n RECAPWT weight at recapture 0/g n LCHANGE change in length .0/cm n WTCHANGE change in weight 0/g n RCOMMENT recapture comments n
